;+ ; NAME: ; SAVE_PLOTSYSVARS ; ; PURPOSE: ; Save important plotting system variables so that they can be ; restored later using RESTORE_PLOTSYSVARS. ; ; CATEGORY: ; Plot ; ; CALLING SEQUENCE: ; SAVE_PLOTSYSVARS ; ; MODIFICATION HISTORY: ; Written by: Jeremy Bailin ; 27 Nov 2008 Released in JBIU. ; ;- pro save_plotsysvars common plotsysvars, charsize, charthick, xthick, ythick, thick charsize=!p.charsize charthick=!p.charthick xthick=!x.thick ythick=!y.thick thick=!p.thick end
